scripts.test:ci: npm t && npm run build-storybook && STORYBOOK_STATIC=true jest --config=visual.jest.config.js && npm run build && jest --config=e2e.jest.config.js
scripts.test:visual: npm run build-storybook && docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static backoffice-visual npx jest --config=visual.jest.config.js && git add .storybook
scripts.test:visual-no-bundle: docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static backoffice-visual npx jest --config=visual.jest.config.js && git add .storybook
scripts.test:visual-approve: npm run build-storybook && docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static backoffice-visual npx jest -u --config=visual.jest.config.js && git add .storybook
scripts.test:visual-approve-no-bundle: docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static backoffice-visual npx jest -u --config=visual.jest.config.js && git add .storybook
scripts.non-visual-checks: npm t && npm run lint && npm run check:types && npm run deps:validate
scripts.create-graph: depcruise --include-only "^src" --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > dependencygraph.svg
scripts.e2e: npm run build && docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/dist,target=/dist --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/e2e,target=/e2e backoffice-e2e npx jest --config=e2e.jest.config.js && git add .
scripts.e2e-no-bundle: docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/dist,target=/dist --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/e2e,target=/e2e backoffice-e2e npx jest --config=e2e.jest.config.js && git add .
scripts.e2e-approve: npm run build && docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/dist,target=/dist --mount type=bind,source="$(realpath .)"/e2e,target=/e2e backoffice-e2e npx jest -u --config=e2e.jest.config.js && git add .
scripts.bundle-analyzer: webpack --config webpack.config.prod.no-errors.js --profile --json > stats.json && webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.json dist/
scripts.code-checks: npm run lint && npm run check:types && npm run deps:validate
